hitchBot, the hitchhiking, tweeting robot that has travelled safely across Europe through German and Netherland, and made a 3,600 miles trek through Canada on the kindness of human strangers, has ended its journey just after 300 miles and 2 weeks in US. Its last destination was Philadelphia, where it was brutally vandalized and its robot brain likely stolen.
